commands.start: 🚀 Welcome to Crypto Arbitrage Bot! This bot is for cryptocurrency arbitrage. It automatically compares prices across exchanges and provides you with the most profitable arbitrage pairs on your selected exchanges. The main working interface is in the web application. The bot is available in Russian and English languages.
commands.help:
📋 Available commands:

/start - Welcome message
/status - System status
/settings - Configure preferences
/language - Switch language
/top - Top 10 opportunities
/subscribe - Toggle notifications
/webapp - Open mini app
/stats - Your statistics
commands.unknown_command: ❌ Unknown command. Use /help to see available commands.
